description: Located in Gowlland Tod Provincial Park. this is an easy trail along Tod Creek to Tod Inlet. The main trail is wide and gently sloped with several side trails to explore.  Some of the side trails have been closed for restoration. At the inlet, there is a steep rocky mad-made beach.
directions: The trail head is on the west side of Wallace Road approximately 500m from the intersection with Benvenuto Avenue. Parking is on the roadside where space is available.
title: Tod Inlet Trail
